english.segment1: Prop open the door I can actually see my breath tonight. But that doesn't mean I'm breathing. Crack a smile just for the sake of it. This could take a while. A long while
english.segment2: Silence is golden especially in this case
english.segment3: I'm not too sure that I want it to be this way. Open mouth closed eyes. No words are escaping
english.segment4: It's all a blur. It's too dark to see. Ain't it pretty the way it all streaks together at night
english.segment5: I think its time to turn around. I really want to go home tonight
english.segment6: I feel like this is going nowhere. Try to think of something quick. And trust the direction of the driver
english.segment7: No lights. No signs. I'm at a loss for words
english.segment8: Now conversation sparks. What an easy way to break the ice
